turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: While I cannot provide a diagnosis, your symptoms could be indicative of several things including tension headaches, sinus issues, or even just dehydration. To rule out anything serious, and given the persistence of your symptoms, it would be best to consult with a doctor. They can perform a physical exam and potentially order tests if necessary. In the meantime, ensure you are drinking plenty of water, maintaining a regular sleep schedule, and managing stress.
